explains: adj. 近端的；近源的；（牙齿）近侧的
wordGroup: zone of proximal development 最近发展区；新近发展区

sentences.en: The bulbourethral glands are exposed proximal and dorsal to the bulbospongiosus muscle.
sentences.cn: 尿道球腺出现在球海绵体肌的近端背面。

sentences.en: Ballism was defined as "Repetitive, but constantly varying, large amplitude involuntary movements of the proximal parts of the limbs".
sentences.cn: 颤搐被定义为“四肢近端重复的，但不断变化的大幅度不自主运动”。

sentences.en: Genu valgum after proximal tibia fracture is specific complication in childhood.
sentences.cn: 胫骨近端骨折后的膝外翻是儿童期的特殊并发症。
